Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

What's the greatest song from the 
Transformers: The 
Movie soundtrack (Unicron's theme 
added)? 

  o "The Touch" by Stan Bush 
  o "Unicron's Theme" by Vince DiCola 
  o "Instruments of Destruction" by N.R.G. 
  o "Death of Optimus Prime" by Vince DiCola 
  o "Dare" by Stan Bush 
  o "Nothin's Gonna Stand In Our Way" by Spectre General 
  o "The Transformers" by Lion (TF:TM theme) 
  o "Escape" by Vince DiCola 
  o "Hunger" by Spectre General 
  o "Autobot/Decepticon Battle" by Vince DiCola 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
